preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 50 grams of manganese(II) phosphate and place it in a clean glass beaker.  
 2. Add 20 grams of technetium(II) chloride and mix thoroughly using a glass rod.  
 3. Gradually add 30 grams of calcium carbonate while continuously stirring.  
 4. Add 10 grams of sodium bicarbonate to the mixture and stir until uniformly mixed.  
 5. Slowly add 200 mL of distilled water to the dry mix while stirring until a thick paste forms.
